data.comment: The match is underway. Farense have kicked-off.
Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Farense.
Tiago Martins signals a Farense throw-in in Benfica's half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Farense in the half of Benfica.
Benfica to take a throw-in in Farense territory.
Farense's Jonatan Lucca gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Ryan Gauld for the away team is judged to be offside.
Tiago Martins awards the home team a throw-in.
Darwin Nunez for Benfica drives towards goal at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 8, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Luca Waldschmidt gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benfica.
Free kick for Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Farense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Farense's Nikola Stojiljkovic is whistled for offside at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 12, Benfica's Darwin Nunez misses with an attempt on goal.
Farense have a goal kick.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
In the minute 14, Pizzi for Benfica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Pizzi puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 15, Rafa Silva instrumental with a fine assist.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Farense.
In Lisbon, Nikola Stojiljkovic of Farense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 21, Benfica drives forward and Everton gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Farense in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Benfica in Lisbon.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nikola Stojiljkovic (Farense) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 28, Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Nikola Stojiljkovic's header is off-target for Farense.
Tiago Martins awards Benfica a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Farense close to the penalty box.
Tiago Martins signals a throw-in for Farense, close to Benfica's area.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Farense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica in their own half.
In the minute 34, Farense's Fabio Nunes has been booked in Lisbon.
Farense to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
In the minute 38, Free kick Benfica.
Farense needs to be cautious. Benfica have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Farense.
In the minute 40, Tiago Martins awards the home team a throw-in.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Farense just outside Benfica's area.
Farense have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
In the minute 42, Can Farense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benfica's half?
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Throw-in for Farense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Tiago Martins will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Rafa Silva is back on the pitch.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Play has been interrupted briefly in Lisbon to check on Rafa Silva, who is grimacing with pain.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Benfica kick-off.
Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Tiago Martins signals a Farense throw-in in Benfica's half.
Farense's Cassio Scheid breaks free at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Benfica.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 50, Darwin Nunez (Benfica) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Gabriel Appelt for Benfica has been booked by Tiago Martins and receives a first yellow card.
Farense have been awarded a penalty in Lisbon...
In the minute 52, At Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica, Nicolas Otamendi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Ryan Gauld (Farense) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Farense have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
In the minute 54, Goal! Jonatan Lucca (Farense) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Lisbon.
That's a fine assist from Ryan Gauld.
Jorge Jesus is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica with Haris Seferovic replacing Luca Waldschmidt.
In the minute 55, Julian Weigl is replacing Gabriel Appelt for Benfica at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
Rafa Silva (Benfica) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tiago Martins awards the away team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Rafa Silva with Pedrinho. This is the third substitution made today by Jorge Jesus.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 60, Ryan Gauld of Farense is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Farense in the half of Benfica.
Benfica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Farense to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Farense push upfield and Nikola Stojiljkovic gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Benfica defence.
In the minute 62, Farense are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica.
Cesar (Farense) has received a yellow card from Tiago Martins.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Benfica.
Tiago Martins awards the home team a throw-in.
Tiago Martins blows against Benfica's Darwin Nunez for offside.
In the minute 67, Farense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Farense make their first substitution with Brian Mansilla replacing Claudio Falcao.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Benfica in the half of Farense.
Can Benfica capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Farense's half?
Throw-in for Farense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 71, Free kick Farense.
Andre Almeida is booked for the home team.
Farense drive forward but Alex Pinto is judged offside.
In the minute 73, Tiago Martins waits before resuming play because Jardel for Benfica is still down.
Jorge Jesus (Benfica) has taken off Jardel who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Ferro is the replacement.
Goal kick for Farense at Estadio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica.
In the minute 77, Pedrinho of Benfica smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tiago Martins signals a Benfica throw-in in Farense's half.
Tiago Martins awards Farense a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Benfica in their own half.
Benfica's Haris Seferovic scores with his head to give his side a 2-1 lead.
Alex Grimaldo with an assist there.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Farense goal kick.
Patrick is on a sub for Nikola Stojiljkovic for Farense.
The away team replace Fabricio Isidoro with Hugo Seco.
In the minute 82, Benfica have a goal kick.
Free kick for Farense in their own half.
Benfica awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Benfica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benfica's Darwin Nunez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Farense defender.
Benfica have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Benfica in the half of Farense.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal! Haris Seferovic extends Benfica's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 87, Great play from Darwin Nunez to set up the goal.
Chiquinho is replacing Darwin Nunez for the home team.
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Benfica.
In the minute 89, Pedrinho is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Jonatan Lucca (Farense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Benfica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Farense's half?
Tiago Martins signals a free kick to Farense in their own half.
Pedrinho returns to the field for Benfica after picking up a slight injury.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 6 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Benfica.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Farense to take a throw-in in Benfica territory.
Farense have a dangerous throw-in.
Ryan Gauld of Farense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Benfica have a goal kick.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Benfica have been awarded a corner by Tiago Martins.
Throw-in Benfica.
Tiago Martins signals a Benfica throw-in in Farense's half.
Full-time! The final score is 3-2.
Pedro Henrique is on a sub for Alex Pinto for Farense.
Sergio Vieira (Farense) is making a fifth substitution, with Bura replacing Cassio Scheid.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-2 through a strike by Patrick. .
